response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the bottom cabinet. Now, the robot needs to take out the board game and the jigsaw puzzle from the bottom cabinet.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the bottom cabinet.
(2) Open the bottom cabinet.
(3) Take out the board game from the bottom cabinet.
(4) Take out the jigsaw puzzle from the bottom cabinet.
(5) Move the robot to the breakfast table.
(6) Put the board game on the breakfast table.
(7) Put the jigsaw puzzle on the breakfast table.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take out the board game from the bottom cabinet
    board_game = registry(env, "board_game_103")
    EasyGrasp(robot, board_game)
    donothing(env)
